name: Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
name_original: Street Fighter II Turbo: Hyper Fighting
description:
Street Fighter™ II defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionizing the
fighting game genre. Street Fighter™ II Turbo: Hyper Fighting, regarded
as one of the greatest games of all time, was the third and final
release of the original Street Fighter II series. The original eight
world warriors are featured, along with playable boss characters Balrog,
Sagat, and M. Bison. The game offered enhanced gameplay speed and
improved character balancing.
This game is only playable in 2D.This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
